record.field: select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,account_account, ps_account_period A where account_move_line.account_id=account_account.id and account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period >= #SPERIOD# and A.year||A.period <= #EPERIOD# and account_account.code >= #SACCOUNTCODE# and account_account.code <= #EACCOUNTCODE# group by account_account.code
From the general ledger management system, take the account corresponding debit balance amount data, example：=KMJE(0,0,1001,JFYE,KMJS=1 )
The amount of the account is the number of debits at the beginning

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,account_account, ps_account_period A where account_move_line.account_id=account_account.id and account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period >= #SPERIOD# and A.year||A.period <= #EPERIOD# and account_account.code >= #SACCOUNTCODE# and account_account.code <= #EACCOUNTCODE# group by account_account.code
From the general ledger management system, the account corresponds to the debit amount data at the beginning of the year, example：=KMJE(0,0,1001,NCJF,KMJS=1 )

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,account_account,ps_account_period A where account_move_line.account_id=account_account.id and account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period = #SPERIOD# and account_account.code >= #SACCOUNTCODE# and account_account.code <= #EACCOUNTCODE# group by account_account.code
From the general ledger management system, the account corresponding to the debit occurrence amount data, example：=KMJE(0,0,1001,JFFS,KMJS=1 )

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,account_account, ps_account_period A where account_move_line.account_id=account_account.id and account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period >= #SPERIOD# and A.year||A.period <= #EPERIOD# and account_account.code >= #SACCOUNTCODE# and account_account.code <= #EACCOUNTCODE# group by account_account.code
From the general ledger management system, take the account corresponding debit cumulative amount data, example：=KMJE(0,0,1001,JFLJ,KMJS=1 )
The amount of the account is the number of borrowers at the beginning of the month

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,account_account, ps_account_period A where account_move_line.account_id=account_account.id and account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period >= #SPERIOD# and A.year||A.period <= #EPERIOD# and account_account.code >= #SACCOUNTCODE# and account_account.code <= #EACCOUNTCODE# group by account_account.code
From the general ledger management system, the account corresponding to the debit amount data at the beginning of the month, example：=KMJE(0,0,1001,YCJF,KMJS=1 )

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,account_account,ps_account_period A where account_move_line.account_id=account_account.id and account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period = #SPERIOD# and account_account.code >= #SACCOUNTCODE# and account_account.code <= #EACCOUNTCODE# group by account_account.code
From the general ledger management system, take the account corresponding credit amount data, example：=KMJE(0,0,1001,DFFS,KMJS=1 )

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,account_account, ps_account_period A where account_move_line.account_id=account_account.id and account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period >= #SPERIOD# and A.year||A.period <= #EPERIOD# and account_account.code >= #SACCOUNTCODE# and account_account.code <= #EACCOUNTCODE# group by account_account.code
The account corresponding to the credit cumulative amount data from the general ledger management system, example：=KMJE(0,0,1001,DFLJ,KMJS=1 )

select #FORMULA# as formula, sum(ps_statement_sheet_cells.numerical_data) as ndata from ps_statement_sheet_cells,ps_statement_sheet_rows,ps_statement_sheet_columns where ps_statement_sheet_cells.row_order=ps_statement_sheet_rows.row_order and ps_statement_sheet_cells.col_order=ps_statement_sheet_columns.col_order and ps_statement_sheet_cells.report_code=#REPORTCODE# and ps_statement_sheet_cells.report_date=#REPORTDATE# and ps_statement_sheet_rows.report_code=#REPORTCODE# and ps_statement_sheet_rows.report_date=#REPORTDATE# and ps_statement_sheet_columns.report_code=#REPORTCODE# and ps_statement_sheet_columns.report_date=#REPORTDATE# and ps_statement_sheet_rows.row_coordinate>=#STARTROW# and ps_statement_sheet_rows.row_coordinate<=#ENDROW# and ps_statement_sheet_columns.col_coordinate>=#STARTCOL# and ps_statement_sheet_columns.col_coordinate<=#ENDCOL#
Take the number from the report management system, example：=BB(0,0,0001,C6)

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,account_account, ps_account_period A where account_move_line.account_id=account_account.id and account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period >= #SPERIOD# and A.year||A.period <= #EPERIOD# and account_account.code >= #SACCOUNTCODE# and account_account.code <= #EACCOUNTCODE# group by account_account.code
Take the credit corresponding amount data of the account from the general ledger management system, example：=KMJE(0,0,1001,DFYE,KMJS=1 )
The amount of the account is taken at the beginning of the year

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,account_account, ps_account_period A where account_move_line.account_id=account_account.id and account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period >= #SPERIOD# and A.year||A.period <= #EPERIOD# and account_account.code >= #SACCOUNTCODE# and account_account.code <= #EACCOUNTCODE# group by account_account.code
From the general ledger management system, the account corresponds to the credit amount data at the beginning of the year, example：=KMJE(0,0,1001,NCDF,KMJS=1 )
The amount of the account is the number of credits at the beginning of the month

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,account_account, ps_account_period A where account_move_line.account_id=account_account.id and account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period >= #SPERIOD# and A.year||A.period <= #EPERIOD# and account_account.code >= #SACCOUNTCODE# and account_account.code <= #EACCOUNTCODE# group by account_account.code
From the general ledger management system, the account corresponding to the first month of the credit amount data, example：=KMJE(0,0,1001,YCDF,KMJS=1 )

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,ps_account_period A where account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period >= #SPERIOD# and A.year||A.period <= #EPERIOD# and cash_flow_item_id = #CASHFLOWITEM# group by cash_flow_item_id
The flow amount function takes the whole year if the default month, and the result of the fetch is sorted by the flow item number,example：=LLJE(0,0,0010,JFLJ,KMJS=1 )

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,ps_account_period A where account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period >= #SPERIOD# and A.year||A.period <= #EPERIOD# and cash_flow_item_id = #CASHFLOWITEM# group by cash_flow_item_id
The flow amount function takes the whole year if the default month, and the result of the fetch is sorted by the flow item number,example：=LLJE(0,0,0010,DFLJ,KMJS=1 )
The amount of traffic debits occurred

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,ps_account_period A where account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period = #SPERIOD# and cash_flow_item_id = #CASHFLOWITEM# group by cash_flow_item_id
The flow amount function takes the whole year if the default month, and the result of the fetch is sorted by the flow item number,example：=LLJE(0,0,0010,JFFS,KMJS=1 )

select #FIELDS# as ye,#FORMULA# as formula,max(account_move.id) as id from account_move,account_move_line,ps_account_period A where account_move.id = account_move_line.move_id and account_move.ps_period_code = A.id and A.year||A.period = #SPERIOD# and cash_flow_item_id = #CASHFLOWITEM# group by cash_flow_item_id
The flow amount function takes the whole year if the default month, and the result of the fetch is sorted by the flow item number,example：=LLJE(0,0,0010,DFFS,KMJS=1 )
